SEARCH
程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.langchain.service.chat

类 ChatService

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.server.langchain.service.chat.ChatService
public class ChatService extends Object
ChatService provides methods to interact with AI chat models, supporting both synchronous and streaming chat functionalities. It manages chat memory, prompt localization, and user context, and allows for clearing chat history.

  • 方法详细资料

    • chat

      public String chat(String prompt, Locale locale)
      Sends a prompt to the AI assistant and returns the response as a String.
      参数:
      prompt - the user prompt to send
      locale - the locale for prompt localization
      返回:
      the assistant's response as a String

    • stream

      public void stream(String prompt, Locale locale, Consumer<String> onPartialResponse, Consumer<dev.langchain4j.model.chat.response.ChatResponse> onCompleteResponse, Consumer<Throwable> onError)
      Sends a prompt to the AI assistant and handles streaming responses.
      参数:
      prompt - the user prompt to send
      locale - the locale for prompt localization
      onPartialResponse - consumer for partial responses
      onCompleteResponse - consumer for the complete response
      onError - consumer for handling errors

    • clearChatMemory

      public void clearChatMemory()
      Clears the chat memory.
